results.definition: not capable of being violated or infringed
complete and without restriction or qualification; sometimes used informally as intensifiers
expressing finality with no implication of possible change
examples: an absolute guarantee to respect the nation's authority

results.definition: something that is conceived or that exists independently and not in relation to other things; something that does not depend on anything else and is beyond human control; something that is not relative
examples: no mortal being can influence the absolute
